name: Aspen HYSYS Simulation File
summary: Learn about .HSC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: You can export HSC files to XML in HYSYS's Save As dialog. This helps with compatibility for different versions of the software.

NOTE: HSC files are not necessarily backward compatible with previous versions of the HYSYS software. Therefore, be sure to check the documentation before assuming compatibility with new versions of HYSYS.

description: File created by Aspen HYSYS, a program used by the oil and gas industry for process improvement; saves a simulation diagram, behaviors, parameters, and other associated data; used in the process of studying and refining plant efficiency, pipeline flows, greenhouse gas emissions, and other related petrochemical engineering issues.
